about_the_game:
In Bank Robber you will experience a story of action, invasion and steal with intelligence.




The game takes place on a bank, in the center of the city, where you can explore various areas of the bank, as long as you have the appropriate access card, thus having different levels of security. In addition to that, you must complete some objectives to complete your mission. You will only have a rifle and a pistol as work tool, and you should assemble a strategy to position it properly, as the bank has metal detectors. You will have to face an area full of security, with strategy.

You will control Harry, in first person and you will have to do some tasks to successfully complete the robbery, disguising yourself as a bank clerk and arriving at the vault at the right time, all this with a lot of action, since the bank will be full of security guards, making it possible for you to complete your objective stealthily, without drawing too much attention. Enter the bank, loot the safe and try to get out alive.
The game experience provides a mix of strategy with a little suspense and action.



In the first part, you will have to enter the bank and disguise yourself as a janitor, performing some tasks assigned to you. Then, after recognizing the environment, you must go to the camera room and kill the guard, without drawing attention, to have access to all the cameras in the bank. Then, continue undercover until the manager arrives, at which time you will get the access card in your room.




In the second part, after you have the manager's card, you will go down to the vault, pick up the weapons thrown in a duct, and steal the money. At this point, when you trigger the safe's alarm, all the security guards will know of your presence, and the police will be called, in this way, you will have to face all the guards and police in order to escape.





Harry, a bank robber aims to rob a government bank, where there are some banknotes that will go to destruction. However, the bank is always surrounded by guards and has the highest quality security systems in the country, including cameras and authentication systems for opening doors. In this way, Harry chooses the day the bank is open to visitors, and takes the opportunity to carry out the robbery.
Harry, upon arriving at the bank, learns some routines, of how things work and then begins to put his plan into practice.


Explore the whole scenario, full of details, easter eggs, and impeccably beautiful.


Are you prepared to rob a bank? So let's get rich!

-------------------------------------------------------
